mapper.select: SELECT assignee.`user_id` AS id, u.`login_id` AS name, u.`avatar_url` FROM issue_assignee AS assignee LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS u ON assignee.`user_id` = u.`id` WHERE assignee.`issue_id` = #{id}

SELECT label.`id` AS id, label.`name` AS name, label.`color`, label.`background` FROM issue_label AS issue_label LEFT OUTER JOIN label AS label ON issue_label.`label_id` = label.`id` WHERE issue_label.`issue_id` = #{id}
